text: Hannibal Vaivao is an American former rugby league footballer for the Washington DC Slayers and Northern Virginia Eagles in the USA Rugby League. His position was prop. He also played American football for the Southeast Missouri State Redhawks and PAC in rugby union. == References == == External links == * (archived by web.archive.org) Hannibal Vaivao Southeast Missouri Redhawks Category:1987 births Category:American rugby union players Category:American rugby league players Category:Washington DC Slayers players Category:Southeast Missouri State Redhawks football players Category:Northern Virginia Eagles players Category:Footballers who switched code Category:Sportspeople from Long Beach, California Category:Players of American football from California Category:Living people Category:Rugby league props
title: Hannibal Vaivao
